detail.title: Good day
detail.text:
I am a software engineer currently living in Almere. Through my studies, I have specialized in algorithms and multimedia. My interests within software lie in puzzling over architecture for new or existing projects to develop them more efficiently.

Besides software, I have a passion for visual arts.

summary.text: Software engineer specialized in algorithms and multimedia.

detail.title: Skills
detail.text:
I have a strong command of the object-oriented, functional, and procedural paradigms. I approach software with KISS, SOLID, TDD, and design patterns.

I have excellent command of C# and .NET. I am proficient with Python, Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript, SQL, shell languages, Git, Linux, AI copilot, and Azure DevOps. I am open to and can easily pick up other techniques and technologies. Besides programming, I am also skilled in the visual field. I have a foundation in UI, UX, 3D modeling, and animation. I am proficient with Photoshop, Blender, and Unity3D.

I function excellently both individually and within teams. On my own, I implement projects and features structurally and quickly. I have professional experience and am well-versed in scrum and teamwork. I am attentive to my team members, can contribute proactively to all team matters, and can articulate my insights to all involved.

summary.title: Strong command of full-stack software development.
